1.title: Pilot

episode of.title: Generic Heroes Save the Day (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: As princess Ojo is kidnapped by the villainous demon Akunjado the two young but foul mouthed heroes Hiro and Shin'Yu are forced to save the young girl from the demons clutches.

2.title: Of Blobs and Kings

episode of.title: Generic Heroes Save the Day (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: As Akunjado orders one of his minions to attack the innocent to lure out Hiro and Shin'Yu our two heroes need to take action.

3.title: Dance You Butt Off

episode of.title: Generic Heroes Save the Day (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: Le Mage, Akunjados newest ally, is sent out to torment the world with the curse of dancing. Now it's up to Hiro and Shin'Yu to banish the mage through dancing.

4.title: No Light

episode of.title: Generic Heroes Save the Day (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: It's time: Hiro and Shin'Yu have to face off against Dracula himself. However he's completely different than they imagined.

5.title: Dog Days

episode of.title: Generic Heroes Save the Day (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: A small village is haunted by a mysterious hound. Now it's up to Hiro and Shin'Yu to defeat the monster, however the monster has other plans for then.

6.title: Time for a Wedding

episode of.title: Generic Heroes Save the Day (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: The night has come, Akunjado and Ojo are walking down the aisle. But Hiro and Shin'Yu come to her aid to finish off the demon once and for all.

imdb.plot outline: In a world full of video games all share one similarity: their heroes are always the same. But what do they really think when following a quest? You may or may not find out in "Generic Heroes Save the Day". As princess Ojo is kidnapped by the villainous demon Akunjado it's up to Hiro and his brother Shin'Yu to save not only Hiros beloved princess but also the entire kingdom.
